Features
Features: PATRIOT P400 V4 1TB M.2 PCIe Gen4 x4 SSD Elevate your system’s performance with Patriot's P400 V4 solid state drive for maximized reliability, ultra-thin profile, and easy-to-install PCIe. The improved graphene heatshield provides better temperature dissipation for greater performance and unhinged efficiency throughout immense application usage

• Built with the latest PCIe Gen4 x4 controller     
• Compliant with NVMe 2.0     
• Support Host Memory Buffer     
• High efficiency slim Graphene heatshield      
• Embedded thermal sensor for thermal throttling     
• Operating Temperature: 0 ~ 70°C     
• SmartECC technology
